text: Carabia or Karabia (), also known as Carrabia or Karrabia (Καῤῤαβία), was a town of ancient Macedonia, placed by Ptolemy in the district of Mygdonia. Its site is unlocated. ==References== Category:Populated places in ancient Macedonia Category:Former populated places in Greece Category:Geography of ancient Mygdonia Category:Lost ancient cities and towns
title: Carabia
